The Immunization Agenda 2030 Measles & Rubella Partnership (M&RP) is leading the charge to achieve the IA2030 measles and rubella specific targets. ğŸ’ªJoin us in the fight against measles and for a world where every child has access to life-saving vaccines! ğŸŒŸ
